_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Leaves
author: lennard@allosmp.de
description: LeavesMC improves Minecraftâ€™s ecosystem with fast, secure and stable software available, providing quick releases and helpful support as the most maverick.
features: pid_limit: Limits the number of processes the server can spawn.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Leaves Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=LeavesMC

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
	echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
	DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/$\{/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
	VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep -m1 true`
	LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

	if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
		echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
	else
		echo -e "Specified version not found. Defaulting to the latest ${PROJECT} version"
		MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
	fi

	BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep -m1 true`
	LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

	if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
		echo -e "Build is valid for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}. Using build ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
	else
		echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} build for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
		BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
	fi

	JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar

	echo "Version being downloaded"
	echo -e "MC Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
	echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
	echo -e "JAR Name of Build: ${JAR_NAME}"
	DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.leavesmc.org/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}
fi

cd /mnt/server

if curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
	echo -e "Successfully downloaded ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
else
	echo -e "Failed to download ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
	exit 1
fi

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
	mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    if curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties; then
        echo -e "server.properties successfully downloaded"
    else
        echo -e "Failed to download server.properties"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description: The build number for the paper release. Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: The version of minecraft to download. Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.
